ciso_civsoc_process_monthly = {
	ciso_reset_all_measures_ci_invest = yes
	ciso_civsoc_process_tooling_handle_creation = {
		ci = ciso_ci_tammany_hall
	}
	ciso_civsoc_process_tooling_handle_creation = {
		ci = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions
	}
	ciso_civsoc_process_tooling_handle_creation = {
		ci = ciso_ci_royal_court
	}
	ciso_civsoc_process_tooling_handle_creation = {
		ci = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations
	}
	ciso_calculate_allocation = {
		ci = ciso_ci_tammany_hall

	ciso_calculate_allocation = {
		ci = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions

	}
	ciso_calculate_atmosphere_stuff = {
		ci = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations
	}
}
ciso_update_ci_pop = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = ciso_civil_institutions
				target = flag:ciso_ci_tammany_hall
			}
		}
		ciso_get_ci_attraction_num = {
			ci = ciso_ci_tammany_hall
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_tammany_hall_population
			value = scope:ciso_total_ci_attraction_num_out
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_tammany_hall_social_impact
			value = ciso_ci_tammany_hall_social_impact_base
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_tammany_hall_organization
			value = {
				value = ciso_ci_tammany_hall_organization
				add = ciso_ci_tammany_hall_org_trend
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = ciso_civil_institutions
				target = flag:ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions
			}
		}
		ciso_get_ci_attraction_num = {
			ci = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_population
			value = scope:ciso_total_ci_attraction_num_out
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_social_impact
			value = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_social_impact_base
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_organization
			value = {
				value = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_organization
				add = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_org_trend
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = ciso_civil_institutions
				target = flag:ciso_ci_royal_court
			}
		}
		ciso_get_ci_attraction_num = {
			ci = ciso_ci_royal_court
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_royal_court_population
			value = scope:ciso_total_ci_attraction_num_out
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_royal_court_social_impact
			value = ciso_ci_royal_court_social_impact_base
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_royal_court_organization
			value = {
				value = ciso_ci_royal_court_organization
				add = ciso_ci_royal_court_org_trend
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = ciso_civil_institutions
				target = flag:ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations
			}
		}
		ciso_get_ci_attraction_num = {
			ci = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_population
			value = scope:ciso_total_ci_attraction_num_out
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_social_impact
			value = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_social_impact_base
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_organization
			value = {
				value = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_organization
				add = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_org_trend
			}
		}
	}
}
